question:
A certain investment doubled in value every 9 years. If Saidah had $25,125 in the investment when she was 27 years old, what was the value of the investment when she retired at 63 years old?
(A) $50,250
(B) $150,750
(C) $201,000
(D) $251,250
(E) $402,000
